text:
Studio III Marketing | Full-time | Full-stack Engineer | In-house (Los Angeles, CA)

CTO here, looking to build a new team of software engineers to build software that makes agency life easier. The ideal engineer will have 4+ years in web application development with tried and tested technologies. React+Redux are a must!

Looking for people who are problem-solvers and looking to grow within a company.

Backend-wise, we are currently using PHP/MySQL but really itching to build something in Go.

Email resumes at jesus {at} studio3marketing.com
